description.value:
When you start a psychic duel, you gain a third natural psychic spell. You can't choose the same spell twice.

If you're 9th level or higher, add the following spells to the list of natural psychic spells you can choose:

  • @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Confusion]{Confusion}
  • @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Crushing Despair]{Crushing Despair}
  • @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Hallucination]{Hallucination}
  • @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Suggestion]{Suggestion}
  • @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Synaptic Pulse]{Synaptic Pulse}
  • @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Synesthesia]{Synesthesia}
